intro: No brakes. No mercy. Just escape.
description:
Pursuit puts you behind the wheel in a fast-paced, driving adventure where escape is the goal. 
Every delivery is a race against time, the police, and the city itself — a city that never forgives mistakes. With no room for error, you must rely on skill, quick reflexes, and sharp instincts to stay ahead of those chasing you.
Each pursuit becomes more intense, pushing your driving to the limit. You’ll weave through tight corners, accelerate through narrow paths, and outmaneuver unpredictable obstacles that test your focus and timing. Every second counts as you're constantly challenged to make split-second decisions that determine whether you break free or get caught.
Whether it's threading through chaos or mastering high-speed turns, your ability to stay cool under pressure is the key.
Pursuit offers a relentless drive toward freedom—where every chase tells a story, and every escape is earned.
